pages.privacy-policy: CodeCraft Solutions - Privacy Policy Services Projects About Us FAQ Contact Us Services Projects About Us FAQ Contact Us Privacy Policy Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details when you fill out forms or communicate with us. Usage Data: Information about your interactions with our website, including IP address, browser type, pages visited, and time spent on the site. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support. To send you updates, newsletters, and marketing communications (you may opt-out at any time). To improve our website and services based on user feedback. Disclosure of Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted partners to help us operate our website or provide services, subject to strict confidentiality obligations. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Your Rights You have the right to: Access, correct, or delete your personal information. Withdraw consent for processing your data. Opt-out of marketing communications. Changes to This Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on our website with a revised effective date. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at email. We are here to help and ensure your privacy is protected.codecraft@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Bowbazar, Kolkata, West Bengal 700014 +91-124-3038200 codecraft@gmail.com
pages.terms-conditions: CodeCraft Solutions - Terms and Conditions Services Projects About Us FAQ Contact Us Services Projects About Us FAQ Contact Us Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to CodeCraft Solutions, the leading provider of software development and web design services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our website or booking a project. Projects All projects must be ordered in advance and confirmed by our team. We require a deposit to secure your project, which will be applied to the cost. Deposits are non-refundable but may be transferable at our discretion. Cancellation Policy If you need to cancel or reschedule your project, please contact us at least 48 hours in advance. Failure to do so may result in the forfeiture of your deposit. We understand that emergencies happen and will do our best to accommodate your needs. Payment Payment is due upon completion of your project. We accept cash and major credit cards. Prices are subject to change, and we reserve the right to adjust our rates based on the complexity and scope of the project. Client Conduct We strive to create a professional and respectful environment for all clients. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone who displays inappropriate or disruptive behavior. Respect our developers and fellow clients at all times. Intellectual Property All designs and artwork created by our developers are the intellectual property of CodeCraft Solutions. You may not reproduce or use these designs without our explicit permission. We retain the right to use photos of your project for promotional purposes. Liability CodeCraft Solutions is not liable for any issues or complications resulting from your project. We provide detailed instructions to help ensure proper execution. Follow these guidelines carefully to avoid issues. Changes to Terms and Conditions We may update these terms and conditions from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new terms and conditions on our website and updating the effective date at the top of this page. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at email. We are here to help and ensure your experience with CodeCraft Solutions is a positive one.codecraft@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Bowbazar, Kolkata, West Bengal 700014 +91-124-3038200 codecraft@gmail.com
